attributes.action: full confidence in Gordon Brown as the Leader of the Nation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: gordon brown is very intelligent,honest and very very strong leader.  he is extraordinary man with an unparallel financial background in the world. british people should and could understand how difficult and how hard he is trying to drive the nation from the economic down turn.  unfortunately, he is at the wrong times.  we could extend all the support and with full confidence in him as he is only the strong leader at this time.  unchallenging poeple's leader.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
